summary: A comical fast paced feature documentary, that questions the health benefits of milk.
cast: T.C. Campbell|James LeQuang|Jennifer Ricciardi|Antonin Oulicky|Matthew Osborne|Shira Lane|Xihuaru Kilcher|Dylan Showalter|Neal Barnard|Rebecca Botko|Amy Lanou|Robert LeQuang|Howard Lyman|Isabel Maples|John McDougall|Radim Mikes|Eva Minemar|Noam Mohr|Minh Tuan Nguyen|Steven Price
title: Got the Facts on Milk?
